pullrequest.title: VariableGearboxPlugin: use splines to support arbitrary smooth input-output gearbox profiles

content.raw: I really wanted the `x_y_dydx` data to be consistent. If I reverse the sign, then it will be x, y, and -dy/dx. It was hard to get the math right even without reversing one of the signs. Does that make sense? I do think we need to document it, but I'm worried about messing with the definition of `x_y_dydx`
content.html: I really wanted the x_y_dydx data to be consistent. If I reverse the sign, then it will be x, y, and -dy/dx. It was hard to get the math right even without reversing one of the signs. Does that make sense? I do think we need to document it, but I'm worried about messing with the definition of x_y_dydx
